casebody.data:
Jerry NEAL, Defendant/Counterclaim Plaintiff/Third-Party Plaintiff Below, Appellant,
v.
TRIPLE H FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP, a Delaware limited partnership, Plaintiff/Counterclaim Defendant Below, Appellee, Jeffrey A. Hoops, Third-Party Defendant Below, Appellee. No. 447, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: April 3, 2019
Decided: April 4, 2019

AFFIRMED.
